item.title: ðŸ’¡ How to Make a Hugo Website
item.description: Why building a website with Hugo? In short, it’s a really fast and simple way to have a static website to yourself, through which you can display your recent projects, share your thoughts, and have fun with it. Before we officially start… The tutorial is based on macOS and I’m using GitHub for deployment. ðŸ› Tools you’ll need Terminal A text editor like VSCode GitHub hugo Setting up Open your terminal - easy!
